sources.title: Murder with Music
sources.description: Night club singer Nelle Hill has many suitors an escaped convict, a piano player and a newspaper man. One is killed. With musical shorts such as “Murder in Swingtime,” “Black and Tan Fantasy,” “Symphony in Black,” and “Ain’t Misbehaving.”

sources.title: Murder with Music (1941)
sources.description: Night club singer Nelle Hill has many suitors an escaped convict, a piano player and a newspaper man. One is killed.  With musical shorts such as “Murder in Swingtime,” “Black and Tan Fantasy,” “Symphony in Black,” and “Ain’t Misbehaving.”

sources.title: Murder with Music (1941) Comedy, Crime, Drama
sources.description:
The beautiful Nellie Hill has many admirers but when one of them gets killed all the others are suspected. All this in among some great singing and dancing, some great bands and songs. 
 
Director: George P. Quigley
Writers: Georges Friedland , Victor Vicas 
Stars: Bob Howard, Milton Williams, Nellie Hill 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Music, Romance

metadata.Plot: The beautiful Nellie Hill has many admirers but when one of them gets killed all the others are suspected. All this in among some great singing and dancing, some great bands and songs. This is a showcase for Black Entertainment of the time.
metadata.Writer: Georges Friedland, Victor Vicas, Norman Borisoff
metadata.Actors: Bob Howard, Milton Williams, Nellie Hill
